Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by Mikala Egeblad, Chair and Edna Cukierman, Chair-Elect of the AACR Tumor Microenvironment Working Group. The 2024 TME Town Hall will feature three presentations from junior investigators in the tumor microenvironment community on the theme of “Targeting the Tumor Microenvironment for the Benefit of Cancer Patients”. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session.
SearchResultBody: TM08. Targeting the Tumor Microenvironment for the Benefit of Cancer Patients: A Tumor Microenvironment Working Group Town Hall
Title: Targeting the Tumor Microenvironment for the Benefit of Cancer Patients: A Tumor Microenvironment Working Group Town Hall
